title: The Holy Quran , Qur'an Koran , 7 Translations Mobi ePub , Yasse
description:
The Holy Quran , Qur'an Koran , Mobi ePub

Seven Translations 

--------------

The Qur'an, believed by Muslims to be the word of God, was revealed to the Prophet Muhammad 1400 years ago. 

It is the supreme authority in Islam and the living source of all Islamic teaching.

--------------

Seven Translations 

1 - Holy Quran (English-Yusuf-Ali)

2- Holy Qur'an in  Today's English, The - Emerick, Yahiya

3- Meanings Of The Holy Qur'an - Yusuf Ali, The - Yusuf Ali

4- Qur'an (Oxford World's Classics), The - Haleem, M. A. S. Abdel

5- Qur'an (Penguin Classics)

6- Three Translations of The Koran (Al-Qur'an) side by side

7- Message of the Qur'an, Asad, Muhammad
